readable.title: 3656030945_fa003bd696
readable.content: A few puppies get washed in the tub . Small puppies in bathtub being given a shower with handheld showerhead Three puppies are in a bathtub getting sprayed with water from a showerhead . Three puppies are in the tub being sprayed with water by a person . Three white puppies are being washed in a bathtub with hand held shower .
